title: [feature request] Add C++ test framework for pure C++ autograd+jit tests
body_html:
Now that #5356 has been merged, it's probably a good time to consider taking tests in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/jit/test_jit.cpp and moving them under a proper C++ testing umbrella.

I have a branch where I ported tests in test_jit to Catch2 (https://github.com/catchorg/Catch2), but @goldsborough and @ezyang raised concerns about adding this dependency.

I'll be happy to move ahead as soon as we identify the best library for the job (Catch2 is kind of nice because it's small, widely used and header-only).

/cc @fmassa @apaszke
